[mypy]
strict = True
ignore_missing_imports = True

[mypy-setuptools.*]
ignore_missing_imports = True
;exclude = setup.py

[mypy-torch.*]
ignore_missing_imports = True
follow_imports = skip
follow_imports_for_stubs = True

[mypy-torchvision.*]
ignore_missing_imports = True
follow_imports = skip
follow_imports_for_stubs = True

[mypy-gym.*]
ignore_missing_imports = True
follow_imports = skip
follow_imports_for_stubs = True

[mypy-stable_baselines3.*]
ignore_missing_imports = True
follow_imports = skip
follow_imports_for_stubs = True
